book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ϩⲏⲧⲥ̅ ⲛ̅ⲧⲙⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲛⲟⲩⲧⲉ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲧⲇⲓⲁⲑⲏⲕⲏ .... ⲟϫⲕ̅ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲙⲁ ⲛ̅ⲥⲱ
English: and in regard of the truth of God and his covenant; and to lean with thine elbow upon the meat;

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ...... ϩⲏⲧϥ̅ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲙⲁⲓ̈ϣⲓⲃⲉ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϫⲓ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϯ ⲁⲩⲱ ϩⲏⲧⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲧⲁⲥⲡⲁⲍⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲕ ⲛⲅ̅ⲕⲁ ⲣⲱⲕ
English: and of scorning to give and take; (20) And of silence before them that salute thee;

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ϩⲏⲧϥ̅ ⲛ̅ⲛⲁⲩ ⲉⲩⲥϩⲓⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ϩⲉⲧⲉⲣⲁ ⲁⲩⲱ ϩⲏⲧϥ̅ ⲛ̅ⲕⲧⲉ ⲡⲉⲕϩⲟ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲥⲩⲅⲅⲉⲛⲏⲥ
English: and to look upon an harlot; (21) And to turn away thy face from thy kinsman;

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ϩⲏⲧϥ̅ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϣⲱⲡ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϯ ⲁⲩⲱ ϩⲏⲧϥ̅ ⲛ̅ⲛⲁⲩ ⲉⲩⲥϩⲓⲙⲉ ⲉⲩⲛ̅ⲧⲥ̅ ϩⲁⲓ̈
English: or to take away a portion or a gift; or to gaze upon another man’s wife.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ϩⲏⲧϥ̅ ⲙ̅ⲙⲉϣⲧ ⲧⲉϥϩⲙ̅ϩⲁⲗ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲁϩⲉ ⲣⲁⲧⲕ̅ ϩⲓϫⲛ̅ ⲡⲉⲥⲙⲁ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲕⲟⲧⲕ̅
English: Or to be overbusy with his maid, and come not near her bed;

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ϩⲏⲧϥ̅ ⲛ̅ϩⲛ̅ϣⲃⲉⲉⲣ ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ⲟⲩϣⲁϫⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲟϭⲛⲉϭ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲛⲉϭⲛⲟⲩϭⲟⲩ ⲙⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲥⲁ ⲧⲣⲉⲕϯⲛⲁⲩ
English: or of upbraiding speeches before friends; and after thou hast given, upbraid not;

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ϩⲏⲧϥ̅ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϣⲁϫⲉ ⲉⲁⲕⲥⲟⲧⲙⲉϥ ⲁⲩⲱ ϩⲏⲧϥ̅ ⲛ̅ϭⲗ̅ⲡ ϩⲛ̅ϣⲁϫⲉ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲉⲩϩⲏⲡ:
English: Or of iterating and speaking again that which thou hast heard; and of revealing of secrets.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲧⲁⲣⲉⲕϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲛⲁⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ϣⲡⲓⲏⲧ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉⲕϭⲓⲛⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲭⲁⲣⲓⲥ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲙ̅ⲧⲟ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛⲓⲙ.
English: So shalt thou be truly shamefaced and find favour before all men.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϣⲓⲡⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲟϥ ϩⲏⲧⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲛⲁⲓ̈ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϫⲓϩⲟ ⲉⲧⲣⲉⲕⲣ̅ⲛⲟⲃⲉ:
English: Of these things be not thou ashamed, and accept no person to sin thereby:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ⲡⲛⲟⲙⲟⲥ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧϫⲟⲥⲉ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲧⲇⲓⲁⲑⲏⲕⲏ ⲁⲩⲱ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϩⲁⲡ ⲉⲧⲙⲁⲓ̈ⲉ ⲡⲁⲥⲉⲃⲏⲥ:
English: Of the law of the most High, and his covenant; and of judgment to justify the ungodly;

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ⲡϣⲁϫⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲕⲟⲓⲛⲱⲛ ..... ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ⲡϯ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲕⲕⲗⲏⲣⲟⲛⲟⲙⲓⲁ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ϣⲃⲏⲣ
English: Of reckoning with thy partners and travellers; or of the gift of the heritage of friends;

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ⲟⲩⲁⲕⲣⲓⲃⲓⲁ ⲙ̅ⲙⲁϣⲉ ⲙⲛ̅ ϩⲛ̅ϣⲓ ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ϫⲡⲉ ϩⲁϩ ϩⲓ ⲕⲟⲩⲓ̈
English: Of exactness of balance and weights; or of getting much or little;

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ⲟⲩⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲙⲁⲓ̈ϣⲓⲃⲉ ⲛ̅ϯ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲓ ⲉϣⲱⲧ ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ϯ ⲟⲩⲥⲃⲱ ⲉⲛⲁϣⲱⲥ ⲛ̅ϩⲉⲛϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ⲧϩⲓ ⲉⲥⲛⲟϥ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲥⲡⲓⲣⲟⲟⲩⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϩⲙ̅ϩⲁⲗ ⲉϥϩⲟⲟⲩ.
English: And of merchants’ indifferent selling; of much correction of children; and to make the side of an evil servant to bleed.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛⲁⲛⲟⲩ ⲟⲩⲥⲫⲣⲁⲅⲓⲥ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲥϩⲓⲙⲉ ⲉⲥϩⲟⲟⲩ ⲁⲩⲱ ϣⲧⲙ̅ⲧⲟⲟⲧⲕ̅ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲙⲁ ⲛ̅ϩⲁϩ ⲛ̅ϭⲓϫ.
English: Sure keeping is good, where an evil wife is; and shut up, where many hands are.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲅ̅ϯ ⲡⲉⲧⲕ̅ⲛⲁⲧⲁⲁϥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲏⲡⲉ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϣⲓ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡϫⲓ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲡϯ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲥϩⲁⲓ̈ ⲧⲏⲣⲟⲩ.
English: Deliver all things in number and weight; and put all in writing that thou givest out, or receivest in.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ϯⲥⲃⲱ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲁⲑⲏⲧ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲥⲟϭ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲩϩⲗ̅ⲗⲟ ⲉϥϫⲓϩⲁⲡ ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ⲟⲩⲡⲟⲣⲛⲓⲁ
English: Be not ashamed to inform the unwise and foolish, and the extreme aged that contendeth with those that are young:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲧⲁⲣⲉⲕϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲛⲁⲙⲉ ⲉⲕⲧⲥⲁⲃⲏⲩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉⲕⲥⲟⲧⲡ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲙ̅ⲧⲟ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲉⲧⲟⲛϩ̅.
English: thus shalt thou be truly learned, and approved of all men living.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲟⲩϣⲏ ⲛ̅ⲣⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲉⲥϩⲏⲡ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲉⲓⲱⲧ ⲡⲉ ⲟⲩϣⲉⲉⲣⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲡⲉⲥⲣⲟⲟⲩϣ ⲥⲁϩⲉ ⲫⲓⲛⲏⲃ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟϥ
English: A daughter is a wakeful care to a father; and the care for her taketh away sleep:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲥϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲉⲥⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲕⲟⲩⲓ̈ ϫⲉ ⲙⲏⲡⲟⲧⲉ ⲛⲥ̅ⲣ̅ⲛⲟϭ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉⲁⲥϫⲓϩⲁⲓ̈ ⲙⲏⲡⲟⲧⲉ ⲛϥ̅ⲙⲉⲥⲧⲱⲥ.
English: when she is young, lest she pass away the flower of her age; and being married, lest she should be hated:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙⲏⲡⲟⲧⲉ ⲛⲥ̅ϫⲱϩⲙ̅ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲥⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲣⲟⲟⲩⲛⲉ .......... ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲏⲓ̈ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲥⲉⲓⲟⲧⲉ:
English: In her virginity, lest she should be defiled and gotten with child in her father’s house;

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ... ⲉⲁⲥϫⲓϩⲁⲓ̈ ⲙⲏⲡⲟⲧⲉ ⲛⲥ̅ⲡⲁⲣⲁⲃⲁ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉⲥϩⲙⲟⲟⲥ ⲛⲙ̅ⲙⲁϥ ⲙⲏⲡⲟⲧⲉ ⲛⲥ̅ⲣ̅ⲁϭⲣⲏⲛ.
English: and having an husband, lest she should misbehave herself; and when she is married, lest she should be barren.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲣⲉϩ ⲉⲙⲁⲧⲉ ⲉⲩϣⲉⲉⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲁϣⲧ̅ ⲙ̅ⲙⲉ ⲙⲏⲡⲟⲧⲉ ⲛⲥ̅ⲧⲣⲉ ⲛⲉⲕϫⲁϫⲉ ⲣⲁϣⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲕ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲥ̅ϯϣⲓⲡⲉ ⲛⲁⲕ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲙⲏⲏϣⲉ ⲉⲛⲁϣⲱϥ.
English: Keep a sure watch over a shameless daughter, lest she make thee a laughingstock to thine enemies, and a byword in the city, and a reproach among the people, and make thee ashamed before the multitude.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲉⲓⲱⲣⲙ̅ ⲛ̅ⲥⲁ ⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲉⲛⲉⲥⲱϥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲥⲱⲟⲩϩ ⲉϩⲟⲩⲛ̅ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲙⲏⲧⲉ ⲛ̅ϩⲛ̅ⲥϩⲓⲙⲉ:
English: Behold not every bodys beauty, and sit not in the midst of women.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲑⲟⲟⲗⲉ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲉⲓ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛ̅ϩⲟⲓ̈ⲧⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲧⲡⲟⲛⲏⲣⲓⲁ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲥϩⲓⲙⲉ ⲟⲩ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲥϩⲓⲙⲉ ⲧⲉ.
English: For from garments cometh a moth, and from women wickedness.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛⲁⲛⲟⲩ ⲧⲡⲟⲛⲏⲣⲓⲁ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϩⲟⲟⲩⲧ ⲉϩⲟⲩⲉ ⲟⲩⲥϩⲓⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ⲣⲉϥⲣ̅ⲡⲉⲧⲛⲁⲛⲟⲩϥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲥⲛⲁϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲉⲩⲛⲟϭⲛⲉϭ ⲛ̅ϭⲓ ⲟⲩⲥϩⲓⲙⲉ ⲉⲥϯϣⲓⲡⲉ.
English: Better is the churlishness of a man than a courteous woman, a woman, I say, which bringeth shame and reproach.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϯⲛⲁⲣ̅ⲡⲙⲉⲉⲩⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϩⲃⲏⲩⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ϯⲛⲁϫⲱ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲛⲧⲁⲓ̈ⲛⲁⲩ ⲉⲣⲟⲟⲩ.
English: I will now remember the works of the Lord, and declare the things that I have seen:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉϩⲃⲏⲩⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉϥϣⲁϫⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲛ̅ϭⲓ ⲡⲉⲥⲙⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥϩⲁⲡ.
English: In the words of the Lord are his works.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲣⲏ ⲉⲧⲣⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓⲛ ⲉⲧϭⲱϣⲧ̅ ⲉϫⲱⲟⲩ ⲧⲏⲣⲟⲩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲫⲱⲃ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲙⲉϩ ϩⲛ̅ ⲡⲉϥⲉⲟⲟⲩ.
English: The sun that giveth light looketh upon all things, and the work thereof is full of the glory of the Lord.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲉ ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ϯ ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉ...... ⲛⲉϥϣⲡⲏⲣⲉ ⲛⲉⲛⲧⲁ ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲡⲡⲁⲛⲧⲟⲕⲣⲁⲧⲱⲣ ........ ⲉⲧⲁϫⲣⲉ ⲡⲧⲏⲣϥ̅ ϩⲛ̅ ⲡⲉϥⲉⲟⲟⲩ.
English: The Lord hath not given power to the saints to declare all his marvellous works, which the Almighty Lord firmly settled, that whatsoever is might be established for his glory.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥϩⲉⲧϩⲧ̅ ⲡⲛⲟⲩⲛ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲫⲏⲧ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥⲙⲉⲕⲙⲟⲩⲕϥ̅ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉϥⲥⲃⲟⲟⲩⲉ.
English: He seeketh out the deep, and the heart, and considereth their crafty devices:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁ ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲉⲓⲙⲉ ⲉⲥⲩⲛⲉⲓⲇⲏⲥⲓⲥ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥϭⲱϣⲧ̅ ⲉⲩⲙⲁⲉⲓⲛ ϣⲁ ⲉⲛⲉϩ.
English: for the Lord knoweth all that may be known, and he beholdeth the signs of the world.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉϥϫⲱ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲛⲧⲁⲩⲟⲩⲉⲓⲛⲉ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲧⲛⲁϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉϥϭⲱⲗⲡ̅ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ⲙ̅ⲙⲁⲉⲓⲛ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲧϩⲏⲡ.
English: He declareth the things that are past, and for to come, and revealeth the steps of hidden things.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲉ ⲗⲁⲁⲩ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲙ̅ⲙⲉⲉⲩⲉ ⲥⲁⲁⲧϥ̅ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉ ⲟⲩϣⲁϫⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲱⲧ ϩⲱⲡ ⲉⲣⲟϥ.
English: No thought escapeth him, neither any word is hidden from him.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥⲧⲁⲙⲓⲟ ⲛ̅ϩⲛ̅ⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲛⲟϭ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉϥⲥⲟⲫⲓⲁ: ⲛ̅ⲧⲟϥ ϥϣⲟⲟⲡ ϩⲁ ⲑⲏ ⲛ̅ⲉⲛⲉϩ ⲁⲩⲱ ϣⲁ ⲉⲛⲉϩ.
English: He hath garnished the excellent works of his wisdom, and he is from everlasting to everlasting:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡϥ̅ⲙⲟⲩϩ ⲟⲩⲇⲉ ⲙⲁϥϭⲱϫⲃ̅ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡϥ̅ⲁϩⲉ ⲛ̅ⲗⲁⲁⲩ ⲛ̅ⲣⲉϥϫⲓϣⲟϫⲛⲉ.
English: unto him may nothing be added, neither can he be diminished, and he hath no need of any counsellor.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲉⲧⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉϥϩⲃⲏⲩⲉ ⲧⲏⲣⲟⲩ ⲥⲟⲧⲡ̅ ⲁⲩⲱ ϩⲁ ⲡⲧⲣⲉⲛⲛⲁⲩ ⲡⲉ ⲉⲁⲩϯⲕ̅.
English: Oh how desirable are all his works! and that a man may see even to a spark.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛⲁⲓ̈ ⲧⲏⲣⲟⲩ ⲟⲛϩ̅ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲥⲉϣⲟⲟⲡ ⲛ̅ϣⲁ ⲛⲓⲉⲛⲉϩ ⲁⲩⲱ ϩⲛ̅ ⲭⲣⲓⲁ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲥⲉⲛⲁⲥⲱⲧⲙ̅ ⲧⲏⲣⲟⲩ.
English: All these things live and remain for ever for all uses, and they are all obedient.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲥⲉⲟ ⲛ̅ⲥⲛⲁⲩ ⲧⲏⲣⲟⲩ ⲟⲩⲁ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲙ̅ⲧⲟ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲁ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡϥ̅ⲕⲁ ⲗⲁⲁⲩ ⲉϥϣⲁⲁⲧ.
English: All things are double one against another: and he hath made nothing imperfect.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥⲧⲁϫⲣⲉ ⲟⲩⲁ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥⲁⲅⲁⲑⲟⲛ ⲉⲟⲩⲁ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲡⲉⲧⲛⲁⲥⲉⲓ ⲉϥⲛⲁⲩ ⲉⲡⲉϥⲉⲟⲟⲩ;
English: One thing establisheth the good or another: and who shall be filled with beholding his glory?

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡϣⲟⲩϣⲟⲩ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲓⲥⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲧⲃ̅ⲃⲟ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲥⲧⲉⲣⲉⲱⲙⲁ ...... ⲟⲩϩⲟⲣⲁⲙⲁ ⲛ̅ⲉⲟⲟⲩ.
English: The pride of the height, the clear firmament, the beauty of heaven, with his glorious shew;

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲣⲏ ⲉϥϣⲁⲛϣⲁ ⲉϥⲟⲩⲱⲛϩ̅ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉϥⲉⲓ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲡⲥⲕⲉⲩⲟⲥ ⲛ̅ϣⲡⲏⲣⲉ ⲡⲉ ⲟⲩϩⲱⲃ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉ ⲡⲉⲧϫⲟⲥⲉ ⲡⲉ.
English: The sun when it appeareth, declaring at his rising a marvellous instrument, the work of the most High:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲛⲁⲩ ⲙ̅ⲙⲉⲉⲣⲉ ϣⲁϥϣⲉϩⲃ̅ ⲛⲉⲭⲱⲣⲁ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲡⲉⲧⲛⲁϣⲱϩ ⲉⲣⲁⲧϥ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲙ̅ⲧⲟ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥⲕⲁⲩⲙⲁ;
English: At noon it parcheth the country, and who can abide the burning heat thereof?

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩϩⲣⲱ ⲉⲩⲛⲓϥⲉ ⲉⲣⲟⲥ ⲉϫⲉⲣⲉ ϩⲛ̅ϩⲃⲏⲩⲉ ⲡⲣⲏ ⲣⲱⲕϩ̅ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲧⲟⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ϣⲙ̅ⲧ ⲕⲱⲃ ⲉϩⲟⲩ ⲉⲣⲟⲥ ⲉϥⲛⲓϥⲉ ⲛ̅ϩⲛ̅ⲗϩⲱⲃ ⲛ̅ⲕⲱϩⲧ̅ ⲁⲩⲱ ϣⲁϥϯ ϩⲗⲟⲥⲧⲛ̅ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲃⲁⲗ ⲉϥⲧⲁⲁⲧⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥⲁⲕⲧⲓⲛ.
English: A man blowing a furnace is in works of heat, but the sun burneth the mountains three times more; breathing out fiery vapours, and sending forth bright beams, it dimmeth the eyes.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲛⲟϭ ⲡⲉ ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲉⲛⲧⲁϥⲧⲁⲙⲓⲟϥ ⲁⲩⲱ ϩⲣⲁⲓ̈ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉϥϣⲁϫⲉ ⲁϥϭⲉⲡⲏ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲉϥϩⲓⲏ.
English: Great is the Lord that made it; and at his commandment runneth hastily.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲟⲟϩ ϩⲱⲃ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓϣ: ⲡⲟⲩⲱⲛϩ̅ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓϣ ⲡⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲙⲁⲉⲓⲛ ⲛ̅ϣⲁ ⲉⲛⲉϩ ⲡⲉ.
English: He made the moon also to serve in her season for a declaration of times, and a sign of the world.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲣⲉ ⲡⲙⲁⲉⲓⲛ ⲙ̅ⲡϣⲁ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲟⲟϩ ⲡⲣⲉϥⲣ̅ⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓⲛ ⲉϥϭⲱϫⲃ̅ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲉϥϩⲁⲏ.
English: From the moon is the sign of feasts, a light that decreaseth in her perfection.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲩⲙⲟⲩⲧⲉ ⲉⲡⲉⲃⲟⲧ ⲕⲁⲧⲁ ⲡⲉϥⲣⲁⲛ: ⲟⲩϣⲡⲏⲣⲉ ⲡⲉ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉϥⲙⲟⲩϩ ⲉϥϣⲓⲃⲉ
English: The month is called after her name, increasing wonderfully in her changing,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲉⲥⲕⲉⲩⲟⲥ ⲛ̅ⲙ̅ⲡⲁⲣⲁⲃⲟⲗⲏ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲓⲥⲉ ⲉϥⲣ̅ⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓⲛ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉⲥⲧⲉⲣⲉⲱⲙⲁ ⲛ̅ⲧⲡⲉ.
English: being an instrument of the armies above, shining in the firmament of heaven;

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲥⲁ ⲛ̅ⲧⲡⲉ ⲡⲉⲟⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲥⲓⲟⲩ: ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲡⲉⲧⲧⲁⲙⲓⲟ ⲉⲧⲣ̅ⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓⲛ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲧϫⲟⲥⲉ.
English: The beauty of heaven, the glory of the stars, an ornament giving light in the highest places of the Lord.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϩⲣⲁⲓ̈ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉϥϣⲁϫⲉ ⲥⲉⲛⲁ....... ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲉⲩⲃⲱⲗ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲩ.......
English: At the commandment of the Holy One they will stand in their order, and never faint in their watches.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲛⲁⲩ ⲉⲧⲡⲓⲧⲉ ⲛⲅ̅ⲥⲙⲟⲩ ⲉⲡⲉⲛⲧⲁϥⲧⲁⲙⲓⲟⲥ ⲛⲉⲥⲱⲥ ⲉⲙⲁⲧⲉ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉⲥⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓⲛ.
English: Look upon the rainbow, and praise him that made it; very beautiful it is in the brightness thereof.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲥⲕⲧⲉ ⲧⲡⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲕⲱⲧⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲥⲉⲟⲟⲩ: ⲛ̅ϭⲓϫ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲛⲉⲛⲧⲁⲩϫⲟⲕⲥ̅ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ.
English: It compasseth the heaven about with a glorious circle, and the hands of the most High have bended it.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϩⲣⲁⲓ̈ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉϥⲟⲩⲉϩⲥⲁϩⲛⲉ ⲁϥϫⲉⲣ ⲉⲡⲉⲭⲓⲱⲛ ⲁⲩⲱ ϣⲁϥϫⲉⲣ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲃⲣⲏϭⲉ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉϥⲧⲱϣ. ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁ ⲛⲉⲕⲗⲟⲟⲗⲉ ⲉⲓ ⲉϩⲣⲁⲓ̈ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲧϩⲏⲗ.
English: By his commandment he maketh the snow to fall apace, and sendeth swiftly the lightnings of his judgment. (14) Through this the treasures are opened: and clouds fly forth as fowls.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁ ⲛⲁϩⲱⲣ ⲟⲩⲱⲛ ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ⲡⲁⲓ̈ ⲁϥϯϭⲟⲙ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲕⲗⲟⲟⲗⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉϥⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲛⲟϭ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥϫⲱⲱⲣⲉ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲱⲛⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲭⲁⲗⲁⲍⲁ.
English: By his great power he maketh the clouds firm, and the hailstones are broken small.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥⲧⲣⲉ ⲡⲕⲁϩ ϯⲛⲁⲁⲕⲉ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉϩⲣⲟⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥϩⲣⲟⲩ ⲃ̅ⲃⲁⲓ̈ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛ̅ⲧⲟⲟⲩ ⲛⲁⲕⲓⲙ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉϥⲟⲩⲱⲛϩ̅ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ.
English: At his sight the mountains are shaken, and at his will the south wind bloweth.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲣⲉ ⲡⲧⲟⲩⲣⲏⲥ ⲛⲁⲥⲱⲕ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉϥⲟⲩⲱϣ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲑⲁⲧⲏⲩ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲙϩⲓⲧ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲕⲟⲧⲥ̅ ⲛ̅ⲧⲏⲩ.
English: The noise of the thunder maketh the earth to tremble: so doth the northern storm and the whirlwind:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁϥⲡⲏⲥⲥⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲭⲓⲱⲛ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ϩⲛ̅ϩⲁⲗⲏⲧ ⲉⲩϩⲏⲗ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲉϥⲉⲓ ⲉϩⲣⲁⲓ̈ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ϩⲛ̅ϣϫⲉ ⲉⲩⲟⲩⲱϩ.
English: as birds flying he scattereth the snow, and the falling down thereof is as the lighting of grasshoppers:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲡⲃⲁⲗ ϣⲧⲟⲣⲧⲣ̅ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲟⲩⲃⲁϣ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥⲛⲁ ......... ϣⲡⲏⲣⲉ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲉϥϭⲓⲛϩⲱⲟⲩ.
English: The eye marvelleth at the beauty of the whiteness thereof, and the heart is astonished at the raining of it.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ...... ⲡϫⲁϥ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲡⲕⲁϩ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϩⲙⲟⲩ [ⲁⲩ]ⲱ ⲉϥϣⲁⲛⲱϭⲣ ϣⲁϥⲣ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ϩⲧⲏⲩ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲥⲟⲩⲣⲉ.
English: The hoarfrost also as salt he poureth on the earth, and being congealed, it lieth on the top of sharp stakes.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲡⲉⲙϩⲓⲧ ⲥⲱⲕ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲧⲏⲩ ⲉϥⲕⲏⲃ ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲡⲉⲕⲣⲩⲥⲧⲁⲗⲗⲟⲥ ⲱϭⲣ̅ ϩⲓϫⲛ̅ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲟⲩ.
English: When the cold north wind bloweth, and the water is congealed into ice,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉϥⲛⲛⲏⲩ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲥⲟⲟⲩϩⲥ̅ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲟⲩ ⲁⲩⲱ ϣⲁϥϭⲗ̅ ⲡⲙⲟⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϩⲱⲕ.
English: it abideth upon every gathering together of water, and clotheth the water as with a breastplate.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϥⲛⲁⲟⲩⲱⲙ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲧⲟⲟⲩ ⲛϥ̅ⲣⲱⲕϩ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲁⲉⲓⲉ ⲛϥ̅ϩⲉϭⲙ̅ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲟⲧⲟⲩⲉⲧ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲕⲱϩⲧ̅.
English: It devoureth the mountains, and burneth the wilderness, and consumeth the grass as fire.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲧⲁⲗϭⲟ ⲛ̅ⲛⲁⲓ̈ ⲧⲏⲣⲟⲩ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲥⲡⲟⲩⲇⲏ ⲡⲉ ⲡⲛⲓϥ ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲟⲩⲉⲓⲱⲧⲉ ϯ ⲟⲩⲣⲟⲧ ⲛⲁⲩ ⲙⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲥⲁ ⲟⲩϩⲙⲟⲙ.
English: A present remedy of all is a mist coming speedily, a dew coming after heat refresheth.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϩⲣⲁⲓ̈ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉϥϣⲟϫⲛⲉ ⲁϥⲥⲙ̅ⲛ ⲡⲛⲟⲩⲛ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁ ⲓ̈ⲏⲥⲟⲩⲥ ϫⲟⲟϥⲉϥ.
English: By his counsel he appeaseth the deep, and planteth islands therein.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛⲉⲧⲡⲗⲉⲁ ϩⲛ̅ ⲑⲁⲗⲁⲥⲥⲁ ⲛⲉⲧϫⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲥϭⲓⲛⲇⲩⲛⲟⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲧⲛ̅ⲣ̅ϣⲡⲏⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲧⲛ̅ⲥⲱⲧⲙ̅ ⲉⲣⲟⲟⲩ.
English: They that sail on the sea tell of the danger thereof; and when we hear it with our ears, we marvel thereat.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉϣⲡⲏⲣⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲁⲩ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲛⲉϩⲃⲏⲩⲉ ⲉⲧⲟ ⲛⲁⲩⲉⲓ ⲛⲁⲩⲁⲛ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲍⲱⲟⲛ ⲛⲓⲙ.
English: For therein be strange and wondrous works, variety of all kinds of beasts and whales created.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲣⲉ ⲡⲥⲟⲟⲩⲧⲛ̅ ϣⲟⲟⲡ ⲉⲧⲃⲏⲧϥ̅ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲱϥ ⲡⲉ ⲡϫⲱⲕ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉⲣⲉ ⲡⲧⲏⲣϥ̅ ⲥⲙⲟⲛⲧ̅ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉϥϣⲁϫⲉ.
English: By him the end of them hath prosperous success, and by his word all things consist.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲧⲛ̅ⲛⲁⲩ ⲉϩⲁϩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲧⲛ̅ⲛⲁϣⲡⲱϩ ⲉⲣⲟϥ ⲁⲛ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡϫⲱⲕ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉ ..... ⲡⲧⲏⲣϥ̅.
English: We may speak much, and yet come short: wherefore in sum, he is all.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲛϯⲉⲟⲟⲩ ⲛⲁϥ ⲉⲛⲁϣⲡⲱϩ ⲉⲟⲩ; ⲛ̅ⲧⲟϥ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲟⲩⲛⲟϭ ⲡⲉ ⲡⲁⲣⲁ ⲛⲉϥϩⲃⲏⲩⲉ ⲧⲏⲣⲟⲩ.
English: How shall we be able to magnify him? for he is great above all his works.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩϩⲟⲧⲉ ⲡⲉ ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲩⲛⲟϭ ⲉⲙⲁⲧⲉ ⲡⲉ ⲟⲩϣⲡⲏⲣⲉ ⲧⲉ ⲧⲉϥϭⲟⲙ.
English: The Lord is terrible and very great, and marvellous is his power.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϫⲓⲥⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲉⲧⲉⲧⲛ̅ϯⲉⲟⲟⲩ ⲛⲁϥ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲉⲧⲉⲧⲛⲁϣⲁⲁⲥ: ϥϫⲟⲥⲉ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲉϩⲟⲩⲟ ⲉⲣⲟⲥ ⲛ̅ϩⲟⲩⲟ.
English: When ye glorify the Lord, exalt him as much as ye can; for even yet will he far exceed:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙⲁⲧⲁϣⲟ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϭⲟⲙ ⲉⲧⲉⲧⲛ̅ϫⲓⲥⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟϥ: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϩⲓⲥⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲧⲛ̅ⲉϣⲡⲱϩ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲉⲣⲟϥ.
English: and when ye exalt him, put forth all your strength, and be not weary; for ye can never go far enough.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛⲓⲙ ⲡⲉⲛⲧⲁϥⲛⲁⲩ ⲉⲣⲟϥ ⲧⲁⲣⲉϥϣⲁϫⲉ ⲉⲣⲟϥ; ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲡⲉⲧⲛⲁϣϫⲁⲥⲧϥ̅ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲉⲧϥⲟ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲥ;
English: Who hath seen him, that he might tell us? and who can magnify him as he is?

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϩⲛ̅ⲕⲟⲩⲓ̈ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲛⲉⲧⲁⲛⲛⲁⲩ ⲉⲣⲟⲟⲩ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉϥϩⲃⲏⲩⲉ: ⲉⲩⲛ̅ ϩⲁϩ ⲉⲩϩⲏⲡ ⲉⲩⲟ ⲛ̅ⲛⲟϭ ⲉⲛⲁⲓ̈.
English: There are yet hid greater things than these be, for we have seen but a few of his works.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲛ̅ⲧⲟϥ ⲡⲉⲛⲧⲁϥⲧⲁⲙⲓⲉ ⲛ̅ⲕⲁ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥϯ ⲛ̅ⲧⲥⲟⲫⲓⲁ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲣⲙ̅ⲛ̅ⲛⲟⲩⲧⲉ. ⲡⲉⲥⲙⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲓⲟⲧⲉ.
English: For the Lord hath made all things; and to the godly hath he given wisdom.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙⲁⲣⲛ̅ⲥⲙⲟⲩ ⲉⲛ̅ⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲉⲧⲧⲁⲉⲓⲏⲩ .......... ⲡⲧⲁⲉⲓⲟ.
English: Let us now praise famous men, and our fathers that begat us.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲛⲟⲩⲧⲉ ⲁϥⲥⲛ̅ⲧ ⲟⲩⲛⲟϭ ⲛ̅ⲉⲟⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉϥⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲛⲟϭ ϫⲓⲛ ⲉⲛⲉϩ.
English: The Lord hath wrought great glory by them through his great power from the beginning.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲩⲟ ⲛ̅ϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲉⲩⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲣ̅ⲣⲟ ⲁⲩⲱ ϩⲛ̅ⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ⲥⲟⲉⲓⲧ ⲛⲉ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲉⲩϭⲟⲙ.
English: Such as did bear rule in their kingdoms, men renowned for their power,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲩⲟ ⲛ̅ⲣ̅ⲣⲟ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲉⲩⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲣⲙ̅ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧ ⲉⲩϣⲁϫⲉ ⲉⲣⲟⲟⲩ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲡⲣⲟⲫⲏⲧⲏⲥ.
English: giving counsel by their understanding, and declaring prophecies:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲩⲟ ⲛ̅ⲁⲡⲉ ⲉϩⲛ̅ⲗⲁⲟⲥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲩϣⲟϫⲛⲉ ⲉⲩⲟ ⲛ̅ⲅⲣⲁⲙⲙⲁⲧⲉⲩⲥ ⲙ̅ⲡⲗⲁⲟⲥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲩⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲣⲙ̅ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧ.
English: Leaders of the people by their counsels, and by their knowledge of learning meet for the people,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϩⲛ̅ϣⲁϫⲉ ⲛ̅ⲥⲁⲃⲉ ⲛⲉⲧϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲉⲩⲥⲃⲱ ⲉⲩϣⲓⲛⲉ ⲛ̅ⲥⲁ ϩⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲗⲗⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲩⲥⲓⲕⲟⲛ ⲉⲩϫⲱ ⲛ̅ϩⲛ̅ϣⲁϫⲉ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲥϩⲁⲓ̈.
English: wise and eloquent are their instructions: (5) Such as found out musical tunes, and recited verses in writing:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϩⲛ̅ⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ⲣⲙ̅ⲙⲁⲟ ⲛⲉ ⲉⲩⲙⲉϩ ⲛ̅ϭⲟⲙ ⲉⲩⲟ ⲛ̅ⲉⲓⲣⲏⲛⲏ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲩⲙⲁ ⲛ̅ϣⲱⲡⲉ.
English: Rich men furnished with ability, living peaceably in their habitations:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁ ⲛⲁⲓ̈ ⲧⲏⲣⲟⲩ ϫⲓⲉⲟⲟⲩ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲩⲅⲉⲛⲉⲁ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁⲩϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲛ̅ϣⲟⲩϣⲟⲩ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲩϩⲟⲟⲩ
English: All these were honoured in their generations, and were the glory of their times.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲟⲛ ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧⲟⲩ ⲉⲁⲩⲕⲱ ⲙⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲥⲱⲟⲩ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲩⲣⲁⲛ ⲉϫⲱ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲩⲧⲁⲓ̈ⲟ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲩⲟⲛ ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧⲟⲩ ⲉⲙⲛ̅ⲧϥ̅ⲣ̅ⲡⲙⲉⲉⲩⲉ
English: There be of them, that have left a name behind them, that their praises might be reported. (9) And some there be, which have no memorial;

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁⲩⲧⲁⲕⲟ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲧⲉⲛ̅ⲥⲉϣⲟⲟⲡ ⲁⲛ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁⲩⲣ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲧⲉⲙⲡⲟⲩϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲉⲩϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲙⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲥⲱⲟⲩ.
English: who are perished, as though they had never been; and are become as though they had never been born; and their children after them.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲗⲗⲁ ⲛⲁⲓ̈ ϩⲛ̅ⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲁⲁ ⲛⲉ ⲛⲁⲓ̈ ⲉⲧⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲟⲩⲣ̅ⲡⲱⲃϣ̅ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲩⲇⲓⲕⲁⲓⲟⲥⲩⲛⲏ.
English: But these were merciful men, whose righteousness hath not been forgotten.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲥⲛⲁϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲡⲉⲩ........: ⲛⲁⲛⲟⲩ ⲧⲉⲕⲗⲏⲣⲟⲛⲟⲙⲓⲁ .... ⲁ ⲡⲉⲩⲥⲡⲉⲣⲙⲁ ⲁϩⲉⲣⲁⲧϥ̅ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛ̅ⲇⲓⲁⲑⲏⲕⲏ.
English: With their seed shall continually remain a good inheritance, and their children are within the covenant. (12) Their seed standeth fast, and their children for their sakes.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲉⲩⲥⲡⲉⲣⲙⲁ ϣⲟⲟⲡ ϣⲁ ⲛⲓⲉⲛⲉϩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲉⲩⲉⲟⲟⲩ ⲛⲁϥⲱⲧⲉ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲁⲛ.
English: Their seed shall remain for ever, and their glory shall not be blotted out.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲧⲱⲙⲥ̅ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲩⲥⲱⲙⲁ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲉⲓⲣⲏⲛⲏ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲉⲩⲣⲁⲛ ⲟⲛϩ ϣⲁ ϩⲛ̅ϫⲱⲙ ⲛ̅ϫⲱⲙ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲥⲟⲟⲩϩⲥ̅ ⲛⲁϫⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲩⲧⲁⲓ̈ⲟ
English: Their bodies are buried in peace; but their name liveth for evermore. (15) The people will tell of their wisdom, and the congregation will shew forth their praise.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁ ⲉⲛⲱⲭ ⲣⲁⲛⲁϥ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲁϥⲡⲟⲟⲛⲉϥ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ⲥⲙⲟⲧ ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲅⲉⲛⲉⲁ.
English: Enoch pleased the Lord, and was translated, being an example of repentance to all generations.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩϭⲛ̅ ⲛ̅ⲱϩⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲗⲓⲟⲥ ⲛ̅ⲇⲓⲕⲁⲓⲟⲥ ⲁϥϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲛ̅ϣⲃ̅ⲃⲓⲱ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓϣ ⲛ̅ⲧⲟⲣⲅⲏ.
English: Noah was found perfect and righteous; in the time of wrath he was taken in exchange for the world;

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ⲡⲁⲓ̈ ⲁ ⲡⲕⲁⲧⲁⲕⲗⲩⲥⲙⲟⲥ ϣⲱⲡⲉ: ϩⲓⲧⲛ̅ ⲡⲁⲓ̈ ⲛ̅ⲧⲁⲩϣⲱϫⲡ̅ ϣⲱⲡⲉ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲕⲁϩ.
English: therefore was he left as a remnant unto the earth, when the flood came.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲥⲙⲓⲛⲉ ⲛⲙ̅ⲙⲁϥ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲇⲓⲁⲑⲏⲕⲏ ⲛ̅ϣⲁ ⲉⲛⲉϩ ϫⲉⲕⲁⲁⲥ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲩϥⲉⲧ ⲥⲁⲣⲝ̅ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲕⲁⲧⲁⲕⲗⲩⲥⲙⲟⲥ.
English: An everlasting covenant was made with him, that all flesh should perish no more by the flood.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲃⲣⲁϩⲁⲙ ⲡⲛⲟϭ ⲛ̅ⲉⲓⲱⲧ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲙⲏⲏϣⲉ ⲛ̅ϩⲉⲑⲛⲟⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲟⲩϩⲉ ⲉⲡⲉⲧⲉⲓⲛⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟϥ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉϥⲉⲟⲟⲩ.
English: Abraham was a great father of many people: in glory was there none like unto him;

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲁⲓ̈ ⲉⲛⲧⲁϥⲁⲣⲉϩ ⲉⲡⲛⲟⲙⲟⲥ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧϫⲟⲥⲉ ....... ⲇⲓⲁⲑⲏⲕⲏ ⲛⲉⲙⲁϥ.
English: Who kept the law of the most High, and was in covenant with him:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: .....ⲇⲓⲁⲑⲏⲕⲏ ⲉⲣⲁⲧϥ̅ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲉϥⲥⲁⲣⲝ̅ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁⲩϩⲉ ⲉⲣⲟϥ ⲙ̅ⲡⲓⲥⲧⲟⲥ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲡⲓⲣⲁⲥⲙⲟⲥ.
English: he established the covenant in his flesh; and when he was proved, he was found faithful.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ⲡⲁⲓ̈ ⲁϥⲧⲁϩⲟϥ ⲛⲁϥ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲁⲛⲁϣ ⲉⲧⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ϩⲉⲑⲛⲟⲥ ϫⲓⲥⲙⲟⲩ ϩⲛ̅ ⲡⲉϥⲥⲡⲉⲣⲙⲁ
English: Therefore he assured him by an oath, that he would bless the nations in his seed,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲧⲁϣⲟϥ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡϣⲟⲉⲓϣ ⲙ̅ⲡⲕⲁϩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉⲧⲁϩⲉ ⲡⲉϥⲥⲡⲉⲣⲙⲁ ⲉⲣⲁⲧϥ̅ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲥⲓⲟⲩ
English: and that he would multiply him as the dust of the earth, and exalt his seed as the stars,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲧⲣⲉⲩⲕⲗⲏⲣⲟⲛⲟⲙⲓ ϫⲓⲛ ⲑⲁⲗⲁⲥⲥⲁ ϣⲁ ⲑⲁⲗⲁⲥⲥⲁ ⲁⲩⲱ ϫⲓⲛ ⲡⲉⲣⲟ ϣⲁ ⲁⲣⲏϫϥ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡⲕⲁϩ.
English: and cause them to inherit from sea to sea, and from the river unto the utmost part of the land.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥⲧⲁϩⲟϥ ⲉⲣⲁⲧϥ̅ ϩⲓ ⲛⲁⲓ̈ ϩⲛ̅ ⲓ̈ⲥⲁⲁⲕ ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ⲁⲃⲣⲁϩⲁⲙ ⲡⲉϥⲉⲓⲱⲧ.
English: With Isaac did he establish likewise for Abraham his father’s sake
